alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Geauga, northeastern Cuyahoga and Lake Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms from Cleveland to Madison. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. The strongest thunderstorm was located over the Cleveland Harbor. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Fairport Harbor, Parma, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Madison, Perry, Highland Hills, Timberlake, Lakeline, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights and East Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
